message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our previous customers. I believe it will be a great addition to your collection. I am offering it to you for $95.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your original price and the price I'm willing to pay.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $90. This is still below my initial asking price, but I believe we can reach a fair agreement.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'd like to offer $87.50. Can you consider that?
